review: Liked our stay at Conrad. Good breakfast, liked the in room dining food quantity, swiftness of services , nice rooms, really nice interiors. Super clean. Helpful staff. Good positive vibes. It was a first time stay with Conrad, will certainly stay again.  Overall a pleasant experience.
Very good hotel, supportive staff and amazing stay
Good experience. But expensive
Great facilities and services. Staff that worked at the Conrad were very respectful and attended to all our needs during our stay.
Great service, comfy rooms, and amazing views. The food is delicious, and the location is super convenient. Highly recommend!
Worth
Staff was very helpful and upgraded the room to executive room.

Great location and staff. Clean rooms. Access to pool, gym and fantastic spa. Mikusu is a great restaurant within the hotel. Very friendly staff at this hotel. Nice place to stay to relax when in Bangalore. Also a quiet place to get any work done. A few restaurants and bars opposite the hotel. 2mins walk from 1MG mall and Juliet bar. There are many great hotels in Bangalore but I come back to the Conrad continuously due to their high level of service and the comfortable stay.
It was a amazing stay.
Extremely courteous staff and great place
It was a great stay..
Everything was well organized and set. Buffet was awesome.

Excellent stay at conrad
Very good location
I love it clean and the smell is fabulous and the location was perfect
My stay at Conrad Bengaluru was very good. I enjoy iconic view of lake from my 18th floor room. Complimentary breakfast was very good. Hotel team is very good.

This hotel is an amazing place to stay away from home. Spotlessly clean. The team loves to serve their customers & the restaurants are to die for. Shout out to Pratish (Bell Captain) & Chandrasekhar (Gym instructor), both are real assets to the Hotel. Definitely stay again for sure. Tyüòä
Great place to stay in the city and at a wonderful location.

Location is excellent, as it's in the centre of the city. The hotel is very well kept, service is excellent, rooms are really nice, with a beautiful view. Pool was really clean. Breakfast buffet was good - but would have been nice to have a confectionery section. Overall, highly recommended.

Beautiful Property and Excellent Hospitality 
We just loved our stay in this Hotel
Amazing array of food for breakfast. Clean and comfortable room with full amenities. Friendly staff offering top-notch service. We'd definitely stay here again!
The hotel is a premium property with a nice view of Ulsoor lake
Thanks to all of you, it was an amazing stay. Beautiful rooms with lake view and great staff at reception and cafeteria. I would definitely stay again

I stayed 2 days in this property Conrad. But the staffs here will judge you by your looks. Which is very pathetic and worst behaviour. Everyone is staying there by paying money only not in free quota. I stayed almost every star property around the world but here the staffs are very worst. The guy Manish who is in Breakfast restaurant he is the only guy who welcomed me with smile face and treated me well. Otherwise everybody will treat you as very bad manner. People who are staying with you are your guests and everyone is same here. Please don't judge a book by it's cover.
Amazing property  had a lovely  time
The staff looked after my needs and made my stay enjoyable.  Thank you, Conrad.

Breakfast was not up to the mark like always. We had visited during October - November 2023 and the quaity of food was better then.
We asked for a complimentary cake for new year and it was written as Happy Birthday on it. Kindly check or ask for the occasion before itself.
Amazing stay! Staff and rooms are the best thing about this place. The view of the lake is gorgeous. Definitely must try
we could enjoy nice view from our hotel and  very easy to main central places. Well they could improve the breakfast session otherwise it‚Äôs really nice place to explore.
Great

It was a very bad experience, the staffs have a big communication gap.
Evening staff, morning staff & late morning staff all are different words.
During the room, services waited for a long time to get stuff. It‚Äôs not like a 5-star hotel. 
Always garbages was left in the room.
I was tired of saying to the hotel staff to clean the room.
It's a bad experience in Banglore.
Great experience. Staff were professional and tried their best to provide great service.

Thank you Conrad team for a very memorable experience, i had asked for early check in, they gave me. I had asked for a high floor they upgraded me. Very friendly staff all over. Well maintained rooms, facilities. The pool is awesome. Food is very good, location is the best. What else can u ask for.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Conrad and it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I walked into the grand lobby, I was greeted by the warmest and most professional staff who made me feel like a VIP throughout my stay. The room itself was exquisitely designed, with elegant furnishings and a breathtaking view of Ulsoor lake from my window. The highlight was the indulgent bath tub, where I could unwind and soak in pure relaxation. Overall, my experience at the Conrad was nothing short of exceptional, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a truly luxurious experience.
Very Good Place
A bit costly but breakfast is good
Great hotel but no space for kids . The spa faculty is great
The location was good. We liked their breakfast buffet varieties. The rooms were clean and the staffs were very friendly and helpful.
Excellent
Nice stay.
Best 5 star hotel,  breakfast was superb.
Great hotel, beautiful service and nice location.
Luxurious hotel, with good helpful staff. Highly recommend.
It ‡∞µ‡∞∏‡±ç ‡∞Ö‡∞Ç unpleasant stay
It's was pleasant stay in this property for 2 nights
Great room with good facilities, clean and tidy with friendly staff. The in-room dining was well served. Must try.
Great place for a family of 4 adults to stay in one room with a fabulous view.  Enjoyed every bit of it including the infinity pool and sumptuous breakfast.

I would not recommend Conrad to my friends, if you are looking for 5 feel, it‚Äôs quite not there yet. We found lot of stains on the duvet covers and our bed. Although, we had read lot of reviews and photos of the same, we thought it‚Äôs one of the case and decided to give it a try but was highly disappointed to experience it. Tiamo restaurant on the 3rd floor is equally bad in terms of their services, it was our anniversary and I had requested set the table for us both but they had us change the table several times because of the leaking patios, later they cut the cake to compensate, Honestly, which was not necessary. However staff is extremely friendly and helpful. We interacted with the chef to front desk to the cleaning staff they all are extremely friendly and courteous.

Great Experience.

Received surprise anniversary cake on our silver jubilee anniversary celebrations at CONRAD.
Thank you much.

A good hotel, centrally located. We were upgraded to a higher floor ‚Äì which was great! Love that the rooms have a French press, and Narender helped us get some good ground coffee to go with it (as opposed to instant coffee). The pool is great, it is heated and the surroundings are lush green despite being on a higher floor.

We found it quite unusual that they recycle their toilet water (which looks yellow). But I guess that‚Äôs okay keeping in mind the greater good! :)
just one day into the hotel and I m loving it. Staff's are good, hotel is very clean and also good view of lake from my room.
Friendly staff especially breakfast time in restaurant
I stayed hear for a day and "feeled the great ambiance of luxury "

I have booked for 3 nights.The housekeeping didn‚Äôt clean the room today until late evening until repeated reminders.No water or tea/coffee replenished for next day.Very unlike a Conrad standard.Irresponsible and arrogant staff.
Outside liqour not allowed. Guests not allowed. Beautilful place and great staycation

5 star experience  
Luxury
Clean
Best üõèÔ∏è

We stayed in Conrad for a night as we needed a break. we had booked for a room on the higher floor, we were offered a room in middle. We checked in to realize the Room was set for a single occupancy, one Bathroom slippers and bath towel, one Robe, a lot of toiletries were not even placed. Seemed like the Room was not even ready for check in. we kept calling for bath towels for hours before we could get it. Front Desk / reception cant care less. they were completely nonchalant and would not even care even when thy got multiple calls for basic things that are expected in the room. which we finally got after 3/4 hrs of been checked in Mini bar was completely empty too. the Rooms are nice and comfortable, but extremely poor staff made us rethink our decision about choosing the property. Taj in Bangalore is a wayyy better choice. the housekeeping manager was the only person who finally tried to make up for the issues. and payed heed to the problems we faced. thanks to him, we could finally be comfortable. 
we dined at the Asian restaurant, food, Ambience & service was good.

We arrived at weekend late night however the room was not prepared. Pay for higher floor money but not meet our expected requirement for room conditions. Telephone, hair dryer, iron equipment were broken. Amenities/ toiletries are insufficient. Not talking about wait so long service to get it. Most worse staying experience at this hotel. BTW, long wait for restaurant too. Never come here
Good one

Everything about this place was perfect- staff, location , room, cleanliness, breakfast and the ambience. 
Definitely my first choice in my next visit to Bengaluru
I have booked for king deluxe room but they provided only twin deluxe and staff were rude when i asked about the same

One of the worst service I have ever seen. The staff is so slow and the fair skin lady at front desk doesn‚Äôt know how to talk to customer. Very rude at her speech. I highly doubt why is she even appointed for customer service
Had an exceptional stay everything was great!

The staff , rooms , facilities where all good , including the fabulous breakfast was nice. 
overall its a good peaceful stay.

I stayed fr three nights recently and had a great time tho initially had to wait fr sometime despite earlier reservation but it was sorted immediately!Everyone were helpful and ready to give the best service!Would definitely stay again!
Good

Cleanliness, good food excellent view from high floors. Very much recommendable to any couple and also try executive lounge access. Friendly staff at all centres. Very helpful if there are small children which will be taken care by inhouse staff.  Overall a great experience.
The food, ambience, staff and our stay was great. Thank you üòä

I had booked this hotel thinking all the Covid safety norms would be followed. However, everyone in the hotel were roaming freely without masks. I even saw people at the security check entering the hotel without masks. The hotel staff was oblivious when I enquired about this. Also, the service was not top notch as I expected. No hair dryer, only one bathrobe and the room service was slow at times. The pool area was restricted due to a private event and I wasn't even informed about this during check-in. I did not expect this experience from the Hilton group. Stay away by all means if you're Covid conscious.
After following up multiple times with the hotel , they still have not updated my points on Hilton Honors
I was there for almost 6 nights , initially wanted to only for 2. It‚Äôs a no brainier

This time had a horrible experience. Even after changing room , problems still remain. In one room , AC control was not working and it was freezing cold. Staff offered another room which has completely malfunctioning electric system. Throughout night lights in the room were switching on and off on their own. Even maintenance staff could not fix the problem. In morning , welcomed by a big stone in breakfast. Just horrible experience.

Very poor service had to wait for 3 to 4 hours in spite of having done advance booking

Booked for three adults but no extra bed provided 

Night shift duty manager doesn't know the basics of hospitality 

It was one of my daughter's favorite hotel but now we have to choose an alternative  after the kind of experience we had at the hotel

I ws not very curious whn I booked for my bday celebration.  But the moment I ckd in  , I was bowled over by the interior,  ambience, staff . The rooms are slightly bigger than other 5 star hotels nd food is very delicious.  The evening on pool side was mesmerizing nd I wud recommend everyone to exp it.
Amazing service!
A great hotel with charming decor, very delicious food and very efficient staff

Everyone was very accommodative, and they even made a special cake for my wifes birthday and also decorated our room in a nice way for her birthday. 

Stellar service.

Made a booking well in advance for a  half-board stay, non-smoking room, paid extra for a lake view room with  bath tub facility on a higher floor . 

At 3 PM we were informed that our room was not ready (which is the standard check-in time). They instead offered us a  smoking room on higher floor OR a room on a lower floor without the bathtub OR asked us to wait for an hour for the room to get ready. We decided to wait and in the meantime the staff offered us snacks at the restaurant which was also delayed. 

Finally we got our room around 5 pm and to our disappointment the bathroom had a very stinky pukish kind of smell. On informing the reception they sent the housekeeping staff to check the bathroom. The staff confirmed there was a stink in the bathroom. They tried cleaning it up and changed the rug but it wasn't very helpful. We requested to move to another clean and sanitised room to which the manager informed that they were fully booked as there was a wedding happening in the premises. We were given an option to settle in where we are OR downgrade to the room without the facilities we had payed for (which seemed totally unfair).  

We had a long day and were tired from our travels. With no option being offered but to accept what was in front of us since we had already paid for it,  we were left with no choice.   We agreed to stay in the same room after getting the bathroom cleaned one more time.

We were offered to move to another room at 8 pm which we accepted coz the stink was persistent even after cleaning multiple times. 

The new room offered to us was clean with a good lake view. However the pillows were not fluffy and were very uncomfortable. We asked for new pillows which weren't any better. 

The food spread at the restaurant was very limited. Offered same choices for 2 consecutive breakfast and dinners . Although the restaurant staff was very hardworking and provided prompt service. 

Overall the stay din't seem worth the money, certainly not Hilton
Best place to stay ‚ù§Ô∏è
The services of this hotel were above my expectation. Just amazed by Conrad.
Room, hospitality and cleanliness was damn awesome... Food was very nice and service was to the next level. Would comeback here for sure.
Each room is well endowed with the best of Hilton standard beds but this Conrad has rooms with great views with the Ulsoor lake which provides a great peace of mind.

I stayed for a night at Conrad. I was happy with the cleanliness. The staff in particular was extremely friendly. The issue was their dinner spread. It was probably the worst I have experienced in 5 star hotel. This was the complimentary dinner buffet provided with the stay. Would not recommend taking that as a part of the package.

Highly recommended, the service standards are outstanding and the staff is knowledgeable and proactive.
I would highly recommend Conrad
Loved everything , only disappointment is that there is no pool access, coz of got regulations.
One of the best hotels in Bangalore. Right from the front desk to room service, the staff was very courteous and professional. Will definitely suggest this hotel any day and it is worth the money
Excellent rooms, hospitality and food. Will return.
Good

I could write volumes about the kind of hospitality the hotel has shown my parents during their stay there, but this review has a word count, so I'll keep it short. 

The hotel itself is excellent, with swanky tech (hidden TV in the bathroom), and great views of Ulsoor lake. The food at the hotel is absolutely fantastic, and the rooms are great and extremely comfortable. The standout, however, is the kind of love and care that each member of the staff shows its guests. Absolutely wonderful. I cannot recommend a better place for anyone, no matter what kind of traveller they are.
Location z not v ideal n many Driver‚Äôs find difficulties t find the place

On checking 
Sir with 1800 INR you can have lounge access
Ok. Can I pay now. I need relax stay without disturbance. 
Nor sir you can pay on check out
Evening time room phone ring. 
Sir you need to pay can I send card machine to your room. 
I will come down and pay. 
7200 INR paid for 2 days. But before he said 1800 per day. Misleading. 
On check out Sir you need to pay 2000 not for lounge access.  Ok paid. I don‚Äôt want to talk to you any more 
This is so annoying. I wanted to pay everything and stay worry free. But this guy didn‚Äôt allow. He wanted to keep hidden cost and give me a bill on check out after I use the service. 
This is very bad. There are many good hotels like Shangri-La and Sheraton. They don‚Äôt do this.
This is by far the best hotel I have stayed in all of India. Excellent service, great location, exceptional cleanliness and wonderful and caring staff.

Beautiful hotel with an amazing view, and exceptional service.  My Father and I felt so pampered during our stay at the Conrad, thanks to our wonderful ‚Äúhosts‚Äù. Special mention to Kartikee, who delighted us with her company whenever we were at the lobby. And the food ... finger-licking is an understatement! The yummiest parathas we‚Äôve ever had!
If only ratings could go beyond 5-stars ... definitely coming back here on our next trip!

Certainly a Star hotel that lives upto the category‚Ä¶ Hospitality at its best! Breakfast spread is great and the quality of food is amazing
Good experience
Amazingly clean hotel and it‚Äôs great interiors
Great rooms, amazing breakfast and fantastic location

This is purely oriented towards business crowd.their over all welcome , room amenities and cleanliness considering it to be a five star is well below industry standards. Guest relations below my expectations
We had great experience

Rooms had top of the line luxury bits. Breakfast buffet was sumptuous. My request to change to room with a bath tub ( my daughter wish) was entertained very seriously by the people in reception even though the hotel was at capacity. ( thanks  especially to Ms. Sunandha helping us out). Overall a great experience not to be missed if you want a place in central Bangalore.
We stayed in this hotel on a weekend it was an awesome experience. We got to meet Shreyas Iyer.

The front office manager Pratima & team made the difference. Services from other departments are fast. Location is q plus...3min walk to MG, 10min walk to the Metro station Trinity and 15min walk to Briggade Rd (shopping boutiques). Also opp The Indian motorcycle (American motorcycle) showroom. The only great let down was the total absence of (a) indian non-vegetarian curries and stir-fried dishes and (a) pork bacon-sausages and other pork dishes
Highly recommend. And it‚Äôs wayyy better the The Taj next door
Not really impressive
easy relaxed, fantastically located , good and professional staff , nice rooms

Pricey but good comfort and location

I must thank the staff Prasansha, Ambrish for taking good care of us. The room was wonderful and we had a birthday celebration which was very well organised in terms of the decoration.

I also managed a large event there. Chandrima, the manager from their coffee shop BBC helped my business guests and our media crew to settle in and enjoy the venue before they went in and spoke at the conference.

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Superb location superb experience good staff quality time spent areas, relax, good staffs,  i wanna include many names who support and very polite for any queries front office back office room services etc,

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review:
It was an amazing experience at JW Marriott. Courteous staffs, food was delicious, cleanliness  is top notch.
It was 10/10

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review:
Stayed here for a couple of nights and have to say that the hotel, rooms and property is well maintained and extremely clean. Defenitely well worth the stay.

I have to say that the service provided by Shreya at the front desk was amazing,  simply first class.  I have never been treated this well in my life by any hotel. Thank you very much Shreya. 

Minor Feedback is around the walking path - lots of the bricks are not well placed and easy to trip at night.  May be better having a seperate walking path that is not shared by the buggies. 
Also staff for lunch at the aviary are not very attentive (waiting or chefs) only when there is no management around. 

I will definitely return for a longer stay.  Thank you Shreya and all staff at JW Marriott.

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Nice location big resorts with lots of space to walking...

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Excellent place for a holiday.

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Personally one of the best experiences of my life. The property is extravagant. The Ambience, the Infrastructure, the Food, the Pool and the list keeps going‚Ä¶. Remarkable. Gives a Vibe of staying abroad.

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: i really loved the stay and all the staff were very friendly and attended to our needs on time. overall i had a great time staying here and will definitely want to come back again.

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Good stay & Dining

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Loved everything about it. Perfect for a weekend getaway with family.

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Stunning views of Nandi Hills and an a amazign vacation - felt like we hadnt had enough and wanted to extend the holiday

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: One of the best hotels to spend your weekend near Bangalore with a stunning view of Nandi Hills.

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Nice property, hotel staffs are very welcoming and provides nice hospitality. They are offering wide verity of food.  I must say hotel food and services are really awesome. We had a great experience there. We definitely recommend the property to our friends for a relaxing weekend gateway surrounded by nature.

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: Great food , good locale and god rooms

hotel_name: JW Marriott Bengaluru Prestige Golfshire Resort & Spa Reviews
review: It was too crowded and nit peaceful at all. The restaurant was taking 2 hours to provide the room service. Even though I mentioned I am here with a 3 year old who is hungry m, they delivered the khichdi in 2 hours. Also, I ordered for vegetable khichdi while they delivered slightly burnt plain khichdi. We did not have the patience to reorder, hence just adjusted with it. The canvas painting was a mela. When we went to the family area and requested for t-shirt/ bottle painting, the person there was not interested. K had to talk to someone senior to accommodate the request. They were showing off as if they will help but no help was provided.
